name: Super Runner (Sosasees 🏃)
description:
Also playable on gotm.io.

Super Runner

A very challenging Jump-and-Run game inspired by Google Chrome Dinosaur Game.

Made for GoGodotJam 2 (2021).

What does this have to do with the jam's theme "Energy Source"?

The Player Character is doing sports.

Controls

Adjust within the highlighted area by tapping there with your finger or clicking there with your mouse (the runner goes slightly Below the cursor for better visibility).

Jump by tapping with a second finger, or by pressing [Space] or [Enter] or [Up Arrow] on your keyboard.

Goal

Dodge the Sand Pits

Compatibility

This game was only tested on Android & Linux 64-Bit.

It may not work on the other platforms.

The Downloads are sorted after estimated compatibility.
